Title: An Act Changing the Name of the Old Provincial Capitol Building of the Province of Antique to Justice Calixto O. Zaldivar Memorial Hall of Justice
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 695
An Act Changing the Name of the Old Provincial Capitol Building of the Province of Antique to Justice Calixto O. Zaldivar Memorial Hall of Justice
Section 1. The old provincial capitol building of the Province of Antique located in the Municipality of San Jose shall hereafter be known and referred to as the Justice Calixto O. Zaldivar Memorial Hall of Justice.
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: March 7, 1984
